Title: Would I Lie to You?
Actors: Richard Anconina, Richard Bohringer, Amira Casar, Vincent Elbaz
Plot: The sentimental and comedic adventures of Eddie, a non-Jew trying to pass as Jewish though totally ignorant of Jewish traditions, as he works in a Jewish community.
Production: Les Productions Jacques Roitfeld, Le Studio Canal +, M6 Films Production, Orly Films, France 2 Cinema, Vertigo
